segments.text: No , the steak was recommended , but it is not very fresh .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , sorry to hear that . This is quite unusual . I will look into the matter .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm sorry , sir . Do you wish to try something else ? That would be on the house , of course .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How about a delicious dessert then , with our compliment ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm not keen on dessert as a habit . They are fattening .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see , sir . I'm sure everything will be right next time you come .
segments.speaker: S1
